00026 // browser window.

00028                    NPError err, void* user_data) {

00031 namespace bridge {
00032 
00033 PiGenerator::PiGenerator(NPP npp)
00034     : ScriptingBridge(npp),      
00035       quit_(false),
00036       pi_(0.0) {
00037 
00038 }
00039 
00040 PiGenerator::~PiGenerator() {
00041   quit_ = true;
00042   if (thread_) {
00043     pthread_join(thread_, NULL);
00044   }
00045   if (scriptable_object_) {
00046     NPN_ReleaseObject(scriptable_object_);
00047   }
00048   DestroyContext();
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool PiGenerator::Paint() {
00052   if (IsContextValid()) {
00053     NPDeviceFlushContextCallbackPtr callback =
00054         reinterpret_cast<NPDeviceFlushContextCallbackPtr>(&FlushCallback);
00055     device2d_->flushContext(npp_, &context2d_, callback, NULL);
00056     return true;
00057   }
00058   return false;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool ScriptingBridge::Paint( const NPVariant* args,
00062                              uint32_t arg_count,
00063                              NPVariant* result) {
00064   PiGenerator* pi_generator = static_cast<PiGenerator*>(npp_->pdata);
00065   if (pi_generator) {
00066     DOUBLE_TO_NPVARIANT(pi_generator->pi(), *result);
00067     return pi_generator->Paint();
00068   }
00069   return false;
00070 }

00078 void PiGenerator::DestroyContext() {
00079   if (!IsContextValid())
00080     return;
00081   device2d_->destroyContext(npp_, &context2d_);
00082 }
00083 
00084 // pi() estimates Pi using Monte Carlo method and it is executed by a separate
00085 // thread created in SetWindow(). pi() puts kMaxPointCount points inside the
00086 // square whose length of each side is 1.0, and calculates the ratio of the
00087 // number of points put inside the inscribed quadrant divided by the total
00088 // number of random points to get Pi/4.
00089 void* PiGenerator::pi(void* param) {
00090   const int kMaxPointCount = 1000000000;  // The total number of points to put.
00091   const uint32_t kOpaqueColorMask = 0xff000000;  // Opaque pixels.
00092   const uint32_t kRedMask = 0xff0000;
00093   const uint32_t kBlueMask = 0xff;
00094   const unsigned kRedShift = 16;
00095   const unsigned kBlueShift = 0;
00096   int count = 0;  // The number of points put inside the inscribed quadrant.
00097   unsigned int seed = 1;
00098   PiGenerator* pi_generator = static_cast<PiGenerator*>(param);
00099   uint32_t* pixel_bits = static_cast<uint32_t*>(pi_generator->pixels());
00100   srand(seed);
00101   for (int i = 1; i <= kMaxPointCount && !pi_generator->quit(); ++i) {
00102     double x = static_cast<double>(rand_r(&seed)) / RAND_MAX;
00103     double y = static_cast<double>(rand_r(&seed)) / RAND_MAX;
00104     double distance = sqrt(x * x + y * y);
00105     int px = x * pi_generator->width();
00106     int py = (1.0 - y) * pi_generator->height();
00107     uint32_t color = pixel_bits[pi_generator->width() * py + px];
00108     if (distance < 1.0) {
00109       // Set color to blue.
00110       ++count;
00111       pi_generator->pi_ = 4.0 * count / i;
00112       color += 4 << kBlueShift;
00113       color &= kBlueMask;
00114     } else {
00115       // Set color to red.
00116       color += 4 << kRedShift;
00117       color &= kRedMask;
00118     }
00119     pixel_bits[pi_generator->width() * py + px] = color | kOpaqueColorMask;
00120   }
00121   return 0;
00122 }
00123
